   19: %%
   20: 
   21: %%
   22: -module(bug_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: 
   26: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   27: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   28: 
   29: -export([otp2163/1, otp4845/1]).
   30: 
   31: suite() ->
   32:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   33:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   34: 
   35: all() -> 
   36:     [{group, ticket_tests}].
   37: 
   38: groups() -> 
   39:     [{ticket_tests, [], [otp2163, otp4845]}].
   40: 
   41: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   42:     Config.
   43: 
   44: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   45:     ok.
   46: 
   47: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   48:     Config.
   49: 
   50: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   51:     Config.
   52: 
   53: 
   54: 
   55: %% BIF exit reason.
   56: otp2163(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   57:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
   58: 
   59:     %% First compile and get the expected results:
   60: 
   61:     FileName = filename:join(DataDir, "otp2163"),
   62:     {module,otp2163} = code:load_abs(FileName),
   63: 
   64:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[ApplyRes|_]}} = (catch otp2163:apply_test()),
   65:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[ListRes|_]}} = (catch otp2163:list_to_atom_test()),
   66: 
   67:     %% Then interpret, and check if the results are OK.
   68:     {module,otp2163} = int:i(FileName),
   69: 
   70:     ok = io:format("Expecting ~p", [ApplyRes]),
   71:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[ApplyRes|_]}} = (catch otp2163:apply_test()),
   72:     ok = io:format("Expecting ~p", [ListRes]),
   73:     {'EXIT',{badarg,[ListRes|_]}} = (catch otp2163:list_to_atom_test()),
   74:     ok.
   75: 
   76: 
   77: %% BIF not loading and not bug compatible, OTP-4845 OTP-4859.
   78: otp4845(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   79:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
   80: 
   81:     %% First compile and get the expected results:
   82: 
   83:     FileName = filename:join(DataDir, "otp4845"),
   84:     {module,otp4845} = code:load_abs(FileName),
   85: 
   86:     CompiledRes = (catch otp4845:test()),
   87:     ok = io:format("Compiled ~p", [CompiledRes]),
   88: 
   89:     %% Then interpret, and check if the results are OK.
   90:     {module,otp4845} = int:i(FileName),
   91: 
   92:     IntRes = (catch otp4845:test()),
   93:     ok = io:format("Interpreted ~p", [IntRes]),
   94: 
   95:     CompiledRes = IntRes,
   96:     ok.
